sect1.title: DEPRECATED
sect1.para: attribute := expression : DEPRECATED DEPRECATED [ ( message ) ] DEPRECATED workflow service ;

row.entry: Optional. The text to append to the warning if the attribute is used.

sect1.para: The DEPRECATED service displays a warning when the attribute is used in code that instantiates a workunit or during a syntax check. This is meant to be used on attribute definitions that have been superseded.
When used on a structure attribute (RECORD, TRANSFORM, FUNCTION, etc.), this must be placed between the keyword END and its terminating semi-colon.
